suncertify.utils
Class EditManager

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.utils.EditManager

public final class EditManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides cut, copy and paste actions that are enabled and disabled depending on the component that currently has focus. Call the registerComponentForEditActions method for each GUI component that will require cut, copy or paste actions.
